Text:
Does it have the DLC?
You can use http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=05045443011679727646 files as a crack. Those are some files from the Tomb Rider Skidrow steam release!
No, these are just the base files, no DLC's (mostly because I didn't feel like buying them).
Crack seems to work fine. It also saves and downloads community levels!
The game seems to also have teleporter levels as described in the dlc description!
Thanks AmuLight and megaman1111. Waiting for this long time. Crack is working fine,also playing in offline. Also have The Teleporter Chambers DLC....superb..thanks man.
